requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 3.4 GHz, 4th generation
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB (Shader model 4.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 470 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game uses the resolution of your desktop in full screen. The game has been tested up to a maximum desktop resolution of 1920x1080 (however this is not a limit). Use a 16:9 resolution monitor.
